metadata.title: CVE-2018-11713 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: WebCore/platform/network/soup/SocketStreamHandleImplSoup.cpp in the libsoupnetwork backend of WebKit, as used in WebKitGTK+ prior to version 2.20.0 orwithout libsoup 2.62.0, unexpectedly failed to use system proxy settingsfor WebSocket connections. As a result, users could be deanonymized bycrafted web sites via a WebSocket connection.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
